charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to Counts 1,2. Defendant is place on probation for a term of 24 months with special conditions: Defendant is to provide the probation officer access to any requested financial information; Defendant is to serve 6 months in home detention with electronic monitoring. The fee of $4.35 for each day under electronic monitoring is waived; and defendant is to meet with the IRS within the first 90 days of the period of supervision in order to determine the prior tax liability and is to file tax returns on said prior tax liability and to pay the taxes owed theron and further to pay any future taxes due. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $150.00 on/before 2/29/00. Defendant shall not posses a firearm; Standard conditions of supervision apply. cc/cl (1-2)
